sentences.sContent: Keep an eye on the noticeboards for forthcoming events .
sentences.sCn: 请注意布告牌上的活动预告。

sentences.sContent: ...will argue in a forthcoming book that college administrations are overly concerned with the social and athletic activities of their students...

remMethod.val: forth(往前) ＋ coming(就要来的) → 即将到来的

trans.tranCn: 即将到来的； 可得到的； 乐于提供消息的
trans.tranOther: a forthcoming event, meeting etc is one that has been planned to happen soon
